The Employer is engaged in the business of developing computer software & Solutions and associated IT support.
The Employer wishes to engage the services of the Employee on terms and conditions of employment as appears herein below.
The Employee is willing as well on the terms and conditions appearing herein below to seek employment with the employer.

div.p: NOW THEREFORE THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSES AS UNDER:

li.p: The Employee hereby offers, and the Employer accepts the services of the Employee, on terms and conditions mentioned in the Letter of Appointment as well as herein below and in the rules of the Employer as maybe framed time to time.

The Employee shall not at any time during the continuance of his employment with employer nor at the time after its termination howsoever arising, convey or communicate to any person any of the “confidential information” concerning the organization, business or affairs of the Employer or any of its associated companies which come to his/her knowledge during his/her employment with the Employer and he/she shall keep secret all confidential information entrusted to him/her and shall not use or to attempt to use any such information.
Obligations of confidentiality in terms of this Employment shall continue, notwithstanding expiry or termination of the Services (Employment) for a period of Thirty-Six (36) months from the date of expiry or early termination of Employment.
The term confidential information, inter-alia, means the following clauses of Information relating to the Employer’s business:

Trade secrets and other proprietary and confidential information which are owned by the Employer and which have to do with the operation of the Employer’s business consisting, for example and not intending to be exhaustive, of its nature and types of services rendered to such clients or proposed to be rendered to prospective clients, fee charged or to be charged, proposals, inventions, methodologies, algorithms, formulae, processes, compilation of information, form and content databases, designs, drawings, models, equipment, result of research proposals, job notes, reports, records, specifications, software, firmware and procedures used in or related to the employer’s products: and
The employer’s relations with its employees including without limitation salaries, job classifications and Skill levels:
Financial sales and marketing data compiled by the Employer as well as the Employer’s financial, sales and marketing plans and strategies, customer lists and non-public pricing:
All ideas, concepts, information, and written material about a client disclosed to the Employee by the Employer or acquired from a client of the Employer.
Any other information designed by the Employer to be confidential, secret and/or proprietary.
NDA is part of mandatory contractual requirements for each employee.

Any discovery, development, invention, copyright, patent, design or improvement of whatever kind, led or contributed to by the Employee during and in the course of his employment with the Employer, whether on his own or jointly with others, shall form the exclusive property of the Employer, and the Employee shall have no copy right or other intellectual property right whatsoever in such discovery, development, invention, copyright, patent, design or improvement, nor shall the employee be entitled to use the same, except by the written consent of the Employer.

The Employee shall not during his employment with the employer enter or engage, directly or indirectly, with any business which competes with the business of the Employer.
The Employee will not engage in any other business directly or in partnership or become a director of another company or receive commission or any other compensation in money or in kind for introducing business to any other person without the written permission of the Employer. Such permission will not be withheld unreasonably, where the other business does not interfere in any way with that of the Employer.
The employee shall not use the confidential information and trade secrets disclosed to him or of which he may become aware during his employment with the employer to do business on his own, or with anyone else’s business, at any time during or after the termination of his employment, however caused, with the Employee.

The Employee certifies that he has no outstanding agreement or obligation that conflicts with any of the provisions of this agreement that would preclude him from complying with the provisions hereof and further certifies that he will not enter into any such conflicting agreement with anyone during the term of this agreement.
The Employer reserves the right to make any change in these terms of employment or in the documents referred to herein by a written statement addressed to the Employee.
The waiver by the Employer of any breach of any provision of this agreement by the other party shall not operate as or be construed as a waiver of any subsequent breach by the other partly.
his agreement shall be construed under the laws of Pakistan

That in case of breach of any of the above-mentioned clauses during and after the period of employment with Employer / BSS , the employee will be held accountable according to the applicable laws and his/her employment shall be liable to be terminated with immediate effect (if employed at the time) and a monetary penalty may also be imposed and payable by the employee based upon the seriousness of the breach. The
monetary penalty would be determined by Employer/BSS in accordance with the terms of service that would
not exceed four times the current gross salary of the employee. In addition to the above employer/BSS shall have the right to blacklist such employee at any or all forums related to IT industry.

Employee covenants that for a period of thirty-six months immediately following the termination of employee relationship with the company for any reason, he shall not either directly or indirectly solicit, induce, recruit or encourage any of the company’s employees to leave their employment or take away such employees, or attempt to solicit, induce, recruit, encourage or take away employees of the company either for employees or for any other person.

Employee undertake that during the term of employment or after the termination of employment thirty-six months, he/she shall neither make any adverse comments/remarks about BSS on any social media forum including but not limited to FB, Linked In, Twitter, Instagram etc. Nor to BSS client in any form.

Employee also covenants that he will not join company’s customers /clients directly or indirectly for Thirty-Six months immediately following the termination of employee relationship with the company/BSS for any reason. In case of violations of this clause company/BSS will be entitled to and will have the full right to take any legal action including but not limited to blacklisting the employee in IT industry ETC. that company may deem fit and appropriate in the matter besides AND in addition to taking any other legal action available under the law.
The unenforceability of any provision of this agreement shall not be construed to nor shall it cause any other provision of this agreement to be unenforceable by reason thereof. The term of this Agreement shall remain in full force and effect during the employment tenure and for three (3) years after the termination of “Employee & Employer” relationship.
The Employee will not copy paste Company/Firms DATA into any personal storage device (for example, flash drive, personal network folder on cloud or any removable device that is not provided or approved by the company).
The Employee shall surrender the Company/Firm/Employer’s confidential information before leaving the company/firm/employment and the employee shall not use any information or knowledge about the company/firm that can harm company (BSS) business in any manner whatsoever by any means.
All the assets including the one mentioned in this NDA/deed are strictly BSS/Employer’s property. The employee shall not retain, sell or use any of this information after leaving the company. It is a clear understanding between the parties and clearly understood by the employee that any software product, module, or code cannot be used or sold under any other name or platform without BSS written consent.
These terms and conditions should not be shown to any person except by the permission of the Employer.
